index.description: A comma-separated list of index names to limit the returned information

format.description: a short version of the Accept header, e.g. json, yaml

local.description: Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false)

master_timeout.description: Explicit operation timeout for connection to master node

bytes.description: The unit in which to display byte values

h.description: Comma-separated list of column names to display

s.description: Comma-separated list of column names or column aliases to sort by

time.description: The unit in which to display time values

ignore_unavailable.description: Whether specified concrete indices should be ignored when unavailable (missing or closed). Only allowed when providing an index expression.

ignore_throttled.description: Whether specified concrete, expanded or aliased indices should be ignored when throttled. Only allowed when providing an index expression.

allow_no_indices.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard indices expression resolves into no concrete indices. (This includes `_all` string or when no indices have been specified). Only allowed when providing an index expression.

expand_wildcards.description: Whether to expand wildcard expression to concrete indices that are open, closed or both.

allow_closed.description: If true, allow closed indices to be returned in the response otherwise if false, keep the legacy behaviour of throwing an exception if index pattern matches closed indices
